src_text: Dr  Mashilo Boloka: Interim Chief Executive Officer of the Film and Publication Board.
tgt_text: Dr  Mashilo Boloka: Interim Chief Executive Officer of the Film and Publication Board.

src_text: Appointed to the six member Board of the International Association of Internet Hotline (INHOPE).
tgt_text: Appointed to the six member Board of the International Association of Internet Hotline (INHOPE).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey (QLFS).
tgt_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey (QLFS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the results of Statistics South Africa’s QLFS for the third quarter of 2022, which indicated that 204 000 jobs were gained between the second and third quarters of..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the results of Statistics South Africa’s QLFS for the third quarter of 2022, which indicated that 204 000 jobs were gained between the second and third quarters of..

src_text: The QLFS also revealed that the total number of persons employed in the third quarter of 2022 was 15,8 million.
tgt_text: The QLFS also revealed that the total number of persons employed in the third quarter of 2022 was 15,8 million.

src_text: This means that the official unemployment rate decreased by 1,0 percentage point from 33,9% in the second quarter to 32,9% in the third quarter of.
tgt_text: This means that the official unemployment rate decreased by 1,0 percentage point from 33,9% in the second quarter to 32,9% in the third quarter of.

src_text: The unemployment rate according to the expanded definition of unemployment also decreased by 1,0 percentage point to 43,1% in the third quarter of 2022 compared to the second quarter of.
tgt_text: The unemployment rate according to the expanded definition of unemployment also decreased by 1,0 percentage point to 43,1% in the third quarter of 2022 compared to the second quarter of.

src_text: While this increase may be viewed as drop in the ocean, it does show that the strategies to grow employment are starting to yield positive results.
tgt_text: While this increase may be viewed as drop in the ocean, it does show that the strategies to grow employment are starting to yield positive results.

src_text: The largest jobs gain were recorded in manufacturing (123 000), followed by trade (82 000), construction (46 000), transport (33 000), and community and social services (27 000).
tgt_text: The largest jobs gain were recorded in manufacturing (123 000), followed by trade (82 000), construction (46 000), transport (33 000), and community and social services (27 000).

src_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to continue to rally behind the country’s Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) to ensure that as country we keep the momentum of growing the economy and creating much-needed jobs..
tgt_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to continue to rally behind the country’s Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) to ensure that as country we keep the momentum of growing the economy and creating much-needed jobs..

src_text: Cabinet acknowledges that the country has long way to go and more work needs to be done to address the challenge of unemployment in the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet acknowledges that the country has long way to go and more work needs to be done to address the challenge of unemployment in the country.

src_text: State Visit to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UK).
tgt_text: State Visit to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UK).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the historic Presidential State Visit to the UK that took place from   22 to 23 November.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the historic Presidential State Visit to the UK that took place from   22 to 23 November.

src_text: His Excellency President Cyril Ramaphosa became the first Head of State to be hosted by the British monarch, His Majesty King Charles III, since his accession to the throne in September Royal State Visit is the highest honour bestowed on country by the UK to further promote bilateral relations and it also symbolises the importance the UK ascribes to its relations with particular country.
tgt_text: His Excellency President Cyril Ramaphosa became the first Head of State to be hosted by the British monarch, His Majesty King Charles III, since his accession to the throne in September Royal State Visit is the highest honour bestowed on country by the UK to further promote bilateral relations and it also symbolises the importance the UK ascribes to its relations with particular country.

src_text: The Presidential State Visit, which marked continuation of the strong bilateral ties between South Africa and the UK, resulted in the launch of the next phase of the UK-South Africa Infrastructure Partnership.
tgt_text: The Presidential State Visit, which marked continuation of the strong bilateral ties between South Africa and the UK, resulted in the launch of the next phase of the UK-South Africa Infrastructure Partnership.

src_text: The partnership supports South Africa’s economic growth through major infrastructure developments and offers increased access to UK companies in projects worth up to £.
tgt_text: The partnership supports South Africa’s economic growth through major infrastructure developments and offers increased access to UK companies in projects worth up to £.

src_text: 37 billion over the next three years.
tgt_text: 37 billion over the next three years.

src_text: The visit focused on upgrading trade and investment levels between the two countries, and also on creating more opportunities in British markets for South African goods and commodities.
tgt_text: The visit focused on upgrading trade and investment levels between the two countries, and also on creating more opportunities in British markets for South African goods and commodities.

src_text: During the UK-SA Business Forum, numerous business opportunities on offer were profiled to UK investors who pledged their continued engagement with South Africa.
tgt_text: During the UK-SA Business Forum, numerous business opportunities on offer were profiled to UK investors who pledged their continued engagement with South Africa.

src_text: South Africa and the UK  also signed Memorandums of Understanding on Cooperation in Science and Innovation as well as Health Cooperation that would focus on vaccine manufacturing, genome sequencing and climate change.
tgt_text: South Africa and the UK  also signed Memorandums of Understanding on Cooperation in Science and Innovation as well as Health Cooperation that would focus on vaccine manufacturing, genome sequencing and climate change.

src_text: Other outcomes from the visit included securing collaboration on infrastructure, clean technology and renewable energy sources.
tgt_text: Other outcomes from the visit included securing collaboration on infrastructure, clean technology and renewable energy sources.

src_text: These opportunities hold the potential to unlock domestic trade, investment and boost job creation.
tgt_text: These opportunities hold the potential to unlock domestic trade, investment and boost job creation.

src_text: Tshwane Automotive Special Economic Zone (TASEZ).
tgt_text: Tshwane Automotive Special Economic Zone (TASEZ).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the production of the next generation Ford Ranger by Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA), which saw capital investment of  8 billion.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the production of the next generation Ford Ranger by Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA), which saw capital investment of  8 billion.

src_text: This resulted in all 10 auto component manufacturing companies located in the TASEZ officially entering into full operation.
tgt_text: This resulted in all 10 auto component manufacturing companies located in the TASEZ officially entering into full operation.

src_text: The investment by the component manufacturers amounted to  62 billion and created 1 259 permanent jobs benefiting youth (76%) and women (32%).
tgt_text: The investment by the component manufacturers amounted to  62 billion and created 1 259 permanent jobs benefiting youth (76%) and women (32%).

src_text: TASEZ was established as special-purpose vehicle production zone with mandate to create employment opportunities and promote economic participation for small, medium and micro enterprises in the region.
tgt_text: TASEZ was established as special-purpose vehicle production zone with mandate to create employment opportunities and promote economic participation for small, medium and micro enterprises in the region.

src_text: Its first phase of development was aimed at creating additional infrastructure and capacity within the FMCSA supply chain to support South Africa to be one of the only three hubs in the world to produce the next-generation Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Its first phase of development was aimed at creating additional infrastructure and capacity within the FMCSA supply chain to support South Africa to be one of the only three hubs in the world to produce the next-generation Ford Ranger.

src_text: National Digital and Future Skills Conference.
tgt_text: National Digital and Future Skills Conference.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the National Digital and Future Skills Conference held in Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal from 22 to 23 November 2022, to strengthen our nation’s advances in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the National Digital and Future Skills Conference held in Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal from 22 to 23 November 2022, to strengthen our nation’s advances in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa.

src_text: Hosted by the Department of Communications and Digital Technologies (DCDT) in partnership with the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ), the conference aimed to, among others, strengthen partnerships in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa, create and stimulate interest in digital and future skills, and explore digital skills training opportunities available for youth presented by the Fourth Industrial Revolution.
tgt_text: Hosted by the Department of Communications and Digital Technologies (DCDT) in partnership with the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ), the conference aimed to, among others, strengthen partnerships in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa, create and stimulate interest in digital and future skills, and explore digital skills training opportunities available for youth presented by the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

src_text: The conference forged partnerships between government, business, civil society, international development organisations and youth organisations to take our nation forward into the digital era.
tgt_text: The conference forged partnerships between government, business, civil society, international development organisations and youth organisations to take our nation forward into the digital era.

src_text: New Thuthuzela Care Centre in Limpopo.
tgt_text: New Thuthuzela Care Centre in Limpopo.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the Thuthuzela Care Centre in the Dilokong Hospital at Dilokong Village in Driekop, Limpopo on Tuesday, 22 November.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the Thuthuzela Care Centre in the Dilokong Hospital at Dilokong Village in Driekop, Limpopo on Tuesday, 22 November.

src_text: The one-stop facility offers services in support of victims of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and sexual crimes.
tgt_text: The one-stop facility offers services in support of victims of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and sexual crimes.

src_text: The centre is the 62nd to be opened across the country and fulfils the commitment government made at the 2018 Presidential Summit Against GBVF to build more of such centres.
tgt_text: The centre is the 62nd to be opened across the country and fulfils the commitment government made at the 2018 Presidential Summit Against GBVF to build more of such centres.

src_text: Auditor-General’s (AG) 2021/22 Consolidated General Report.
tgt_text: Auditor-General’s (AG) 2021/22 Consolidated General Report.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2021/22 Public Finance Management Act audit outcomes of the national and provincial government, which were released by AG Tsakani Maluleke on Wednesday, 23 November 2022 under the theme: “A culture of accountability will improve service delivery”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2021/22 Public Finance Management Act audit outcomes of the national and provincial government, which were released by AG Tsakani Maluleke on Wednesday, 23 November 2022 under the theme: “A culture of accountability will improve service delivery”.

src_text: Cabinet noted the gradual upward trend in the audit outcomes of national and provincial government but expressed concern that key service delivery portfolios continued to receive poor outcomes.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the gradual upward trend in the audit outcomes of national and provincial government but expressed concern that key service delivery portfolios continued to receive poor outcomes.

src_text: Based on the completed audits of 160 departments, 47 departments had improved and 12 had regressed.
tgt_text: Based on the completed audits of 160 departments, 47 departments had improved and 12 had regressed.

src_text: Similarly, of the 238 public entities with completed audits, 67 had improved and 34 had regressed.
tgt_text: Similarly, of the 238 public entities with completed audits, 67 had improved and 34 had regressed.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to taking corrective measures to address the root causes that lead to poor audit outcomes and remove weaknesses to achieve clean audits.
tgt_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to taking corrective measures to address the root causes that lead to poor audit outcomes and remove weaknesses to achieve clean audits.

src_text: Safer Festive Season campaign.
tgt_text: Safer Festive Season campaign.

src_text: Government recently launched the 2022 Safer Festive Season campaign under the theme: “More boots on the ground towards enhanced police visibility.”.
tgt_text: Government recently launched the 2022 Safer Festive Season campaign under the theme: “More boots on the ground towards enhanced police visibility.”.

src_text: To ensure the well-being and safety of all residents and tourists in our country during the festive season and beyond, heightened police visibility will include intensified and integrated crime-prevention and crime-combating operations by the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: To ensure the well-being and safety of all residents and tourists in our country during the festive season and beyond, heightened police visibility will include intensified and integrated crime-prevention and crime-combating operations by the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Cabinet calls on all people to work with law-enforcement authorities to keep our communities safe.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all people to work with law-enforcement authorities to keep our communities safe.

src_text: As traffic volumes on our national roads increase, all road users are urged to be vigilant, and to obey traffic rules and regulations such as speed limits.
tgt_text: As traffic volumes on our national roads increase, all road users are urged to be vigilant, and to obey traffic rules and regulations such as speed limits.

src_text: Do not drive while under the influence of alcohol, always wear your seatbelt, keep safe following distance and stop at safe place to rest after at least every three hours of driving.
tgt_text: Do not drive while under the influence of alcohol, always wear your seatbelt, keep safe following distance and stop at safe place to rest after at least every three hours of driving.

src_text: Be courteous to other road users so that we can all reach our destinations safely.
tgt_text: Be courteous to other road users so that we can all reach our destinations safely.

src_text: Cabinet urges everyone to take extra care this festive season to ensure their own safety and that of others, especially children, who must be supervised at all times.
tgt_text: Cabinet urges everyone to take extra care this festive season to ensure their own safety and that of others, especially children, who must be supervised at all times.

src_text: By exercising extreme care and responsible behaviour, we can guarantee an enjoyable time of celebration with family and friends.
tgt_text: By exercising extreme care and responsible behaviour, we can guarantee an enjoyable time of celebration with family and friends.

src_text: South Africa Green Hydrogen Summit (SAGHS).
tgt_text: South Africa Green Hydrogen Summit (SAGHS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the country’s inaugural SAGHS 2022 held in Cape Town from 28 to 30 November 2022, which showcased our nation’s offerings as world-class green hydrogen production hub.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the country’s inaugural SAGHS 2022 held in Cape Town from 28 to 30 November 2022, which showcased our nation’s offerings as world-class green hydrogen production hub.

src_text: In creating the environment for the green hydrogen sector to flourish, government has developed Hydrogen SA Strategy that taps into our nation’s endowment of renewable energy and platinum catalyst in the hydrogen electrolysis process, to position South Africa as global leader in this new market.
tgt_text: In creating the environment for the green hydrogen sector to flourish, government has developed Hydrogen SA Strategy that taps into our nation’s endowment of renewable energy and platinum catalyst in the hydrogen electrolysis process, to position South Africa as global leader in this new market.

src_text: The green hydrogen economy is part of our work under the ERRP to explore new sources of economic growth that have the potential to revolutionise our economy and create new jobs.
tgt_text: The green hydrogen economy is part of our work under the ERRP to explore new sources of economic growth that have the potential to revolutionise our economy and create new jobs.

src_text: Launch of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Institute of South Africa.
tgt_text: Launch of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Institute of South Africa.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the collaboration between the DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology and the University of Johannesburg that resulted in the launch of the AI Institute of South at the Johannesburg Business School on Wednesday, 30 November..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the collaboration between the DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology and the University of Johannesburg that resulted in the launch of the AI Institute of South at the Johannesburg Business School on Wednesday, 30 November..

src_text: The first-of-its-kind institute ushers new era in South Africa’s digital transformation efforts.
tgt_text: The first-of-its-kind institute ushers new era in South Africa’s digital transformation efforts.

src_text: It will stimulate economic growth, address unemployment and create positive social impact.
tgt_text: It will stimulate economic growth, address unemployment and create positive social impact.

src_text: The AI Institute will expand the teaching of robotics and coding currently being offered in public schools.
tgt_text: The AI Institute will expand the teaching of robotics and coding currently being offered in public schools.

src_text: The institute is designed to ensure that government academia and industry work together in unique partnership to apply their collective knowledge, expertise and experience to implement coordinated solutions to some of South Africa and Africa’s most critical and long-standing challenges, and to take the continent forward.
tgt_text: The institute is designed to ensure that government academia and industry work together in unique partnership to apply their collective knowledge, expertise and experience to implement coordinated solutions to some of South Africa and Africa’s most critical and long-standing challenges, and to take the continent forward.

src_text: Government’s focus on digital skills includes creating platforms to support and promote the ability of youth, and small and medium enterprises, in particular start-ups, to develop digital content  Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Government’s focus on digital skills includes creating platforms to support and promote the ability of youth, and small and medium enterprises, in particular start-ups, to develop digital content  Cabinet decisions.

src_text: Research Report on the economic costs of disability for children with disabilities and persons with physical disabilities in South Africa.
tgt_text: Research Report on the economic costs of disability for children with disabilities and persons with physical disabilities in South Africa.

src_text: Cabinet considered and approved the Research Report that was commissioned by the Department for Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities (DWYPD), in partnership with the United Nations (UN) Development Programme (UNDP).
tgt_text: Cabinet considered and approved the Research Report that was commissioned by the Department for Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities (DWYPD), in partnership with the United Nations (UN) Development Programme (UNDP).

src_text: The research provides information on disability-related costs on households with children with disabilities and adults with physical disabilities.
tgt_text: The research provides information on disability-related costs on households with children with disabilities and adults with physical disabilities.

src_text: The research insights provide evidence of cost estimates for, among others, the determination of social-security benefits subsidisation of services for persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: The research insights provide evidence of cost estimates for, among others, the determination of social-security benefits subsidisation of services for persons with disabilities.

src_text: This report complements the study also done by the UNDP between 2013 and 2015 on elements of the financial and economic costs of disability households in South Africa.
tgt_text: This report complements the study also done by the UNDP between 2013 and 2015 on elements of the financial and economic costs of disability households in South Africa.

src_text: The report will be published after it has been gazetted.
tgt_text: The report will be published after it has been gazetted.

src_text: Rapid Evaluation of the implementation of government policy on preferential public procurement towards women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Rapid Evaluation of the implementation of government policy on preferential public procurement towards women, youth and persons with disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet received an evaluation report that assessed the compliance rate by national and provincial departments on the preferential procurement application on businesses owned by women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Cabinet received an evaluation report that assessed the compliance rate by national and provincial departments on the preferential procurement application on businesses owned by women, youth and persons with disabilities.

src_text: The evaluation covered the period from 2018 to..  Data was collected from National Treasury’s Central Supplier Database (CSD) and respondents from departments to the questionnaires sent to them.
tgt_text: The evaluation covered the period from 2018 to..  Data was collected from National Treasury’s Central Supplier Database (CSD) and respondents from departments to the questionnaires sent to them.

src_text: The data did not, however, capture information from all the departments, but was sufficient enough to guide Cabinet on areas that need strengthening to ensure full compliance.
tgt_text: The data did not, however, capture information from all the departments, but was sufficient enough to guide Cabinet on areas that need strengthening to ensure full compliance.

src_text: Cabinet approved all the intervention recommendations that will ensure government complies with the 40% procurement to women in particular.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved all the intervention recommendations that will ensure government complies with the 40% procurement to women in particular.

src_text: Some of the recommendations include the enhancement of the CSD software, and the training and awareness raising of accounting officers and Supply Chain Management practitioners in departments.
tgt_text: Some of the recommendations include the enhancement of the CSD software, and the training and awareness raising of accounting officers and Supply Chain Management practitioners in departments.

src_text: The full report will be posted on the DWYPD’s website: www.dwypd.gov.za.
tgt_text: The full report will be posted on the DWYPD’s website: www.dwypd.gov.za.

src_text: Science, Technology and Innovation (STI) Decadal Plan.
tgt_text: Science, Technology and Innovation (STI) Decadal Plan.

src_text: Cabinet approved the 2022 STI Decadal Plan, which serves as an implementation guide of the 2019 White Paper on STI.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the 2022 STI Decadal Plan, which serves as an implementation guide of the 2019 White Paper on STI.

src_text: Cabinet approved the draft plan in March 2021 and has since been enriched through further consultation with relevant stakeholders.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the draft plan in March 2021 and has since been enriched through further consultation with relevant stakeholders.

src_text: The plan has five thematic focus areas: (1) modernisation of agricultural, manufacturing and mining sectors; (2) exploitation of new sources of growth, particularly the digital and circular economy; (3) large research and innovation programmes in the areas of health and energy; (4) utilising STI to support capable state and (5) addressing three societal grand challenges, namely climate change and environmental sustainability, the future of education, skills development and work, and the future of society.
tgt_text: The plan has five thematic focus areas: (1) modernisation of agricultural, manufacturing and mining sectors; (2) exploitation of new sources of growth, particularly the digital and circular economy; (3) large research and innovation programmes in the areas of health and energy; (4) utilising STI to support capable state and (5) addressing three societal grand challenges, namely climate change and environmental sustainability, the future of education, skills development and work, and the future of society.

src_text: The first Decadal Plan for 2008-2018, together with the 2002 National Research and Development Strategy, served as the basis of the current Decadal Plan.
tgt_text: The first Decadal Plan for 2008-2018, together with the 2002 National Research and Development Strategy, served as the basis of the current Decadal Plan.

src_text: These plans advance the government’s approach to innovation in South Africa.
tgt_text: These plans advance the government’s approach to innovation in South Africa.

src_text: The document will be made public through the Department of Science and Innovation’s (DSI) website: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: The document will be made public through the Department of Science and Innovation’s (DSI) website: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: National Strategy and Risk Assessment on Anti-Money Laundering, Counter Financing of Terrorism and Counter Financing of Proliferation (AML/CFT/CPF).
tgt_text: National Strategy and Risk Assessment on Anti-Money Laundering, Counter Financing of Terrorism and Counter Financing of Proliferation (AML/CFT/CPF).

src_text: Cabinet approved the country’s National Strategy on AML/CFT/CPF, together with the National Risk Assessment.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the country’s National Strategy on AML/CFT/CPF, together with the National Risk Assessment.

src_text: The strategy was developed as response to the risk assessment prepared by all the relevant security and finance agencies.
tgt_text: The strategy was developed as response to the risk assessment prepared by all the relevant security and finance agencies.

src_text: The operationalisation of this strategy – which provides three high-level goals with 13 strategic objectives – will involve law-enforcement agencies, intelligence agencies, financial and non-financial institutions, and private-sector representatives, among others.
tgt_text: The operationalisation of this strategy – which provides three high-level goals with 13 strategic objectives – will involve law-enforcement agencies, intelligence agencies, financial and non-financial institutions, and private-sector representatives, among others.

src_text: The implementation of the strategy will ensure the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth interventions by reducing levels of finance-related crimes.
tgt_text: The implementation of the strategy will ensure the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth interventions by reducing levels of finance-related crimes.

src_text: The strategy also responds to some of the 40 recommendations made after South Africa was assessed by the Financial Action Task Force, an intergovernmental policymaking body that strives to combat terrorist financing and money laundering globally.
tgt_text: The strategy also responds to some of the 40 recommendations made after South Africa was assessed by the Financial Action Task Force, an intergovernmental policymaking body that strives to combat terrorist financing and money laundering globally.

src_text: The summarised two reports will be published on National Treasury’s website: www.treasury.gov.za.
tgt_text: The summarised two reports will be published on National Treasury’s website: www.treasury.gov.za.

src_text: Green Hydrogen Commercialisation Strategy (GHCS).
tgt_text: Green Hydrogen Commercialisation Strategy (GHCS).

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the GHCS for public comments.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the GHCS for public comments.

src_text: The strategy is aimed at ensuring that the country takes full advantage of the opportunities provided by green industrialisation.
tgt_text: The strategy is aimed at ensuring that the country takes full advantage of the opportunities provided by green industrialisation.

src_text: The GHCS will ensure South Africa becomes major producer and exporter of green hydrogen.
tgt_text: The GHCS will ensure South Africa becomes major producer and exporter of green hydrogen.

src_text: It contributes towards economic growth and supports the country’s just transition interventions towards the reduction of carbon emissions.
tgt_text: It contributes towards economic growth and supports the country’s just transition interventions towards the reduction of carbon emissions.

src_text: South Africa already has the Hydrogen Strategy and the Hydrogen Society Roadmap adopted by Cabinet in.
tgt_text: South Africa already has the Hydrogen Strategy and the Hydrogen Society Roadmap adopted by Cabinet in.

src_text: The rapidly growing green hydrogen market presents huge opportunities for South Africa.
tgt_text: The rapidly growing green hydrogen market presents huge opportunities for South Africa.

src_text: State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.
tgt_text: State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.

src_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.

src_text: The strategy seeks to drive the transformation of the legal profession in systematic manner.
tgt_text: The strategy seeks to drive the transformation of the legal profession in systematic manner.

src_text: It guides on how the State will distribute legal work to legal practitioners; manage the costs of the litigation; guides the management of stakeholders; provides for the maximisation of the use of technology and systems..
tgt_text: It guides on how the State will distribute legal work to legal practitioners; manage the costs of the litigation; guides the management of stakeholders; provides for the maximisation of the use of technology and systems..

src_text: The strategy also addresses the development of human capacity management and development.
tgt_text: The strategy also addresses the development of human capacity management and development.

src_text: It will be applicable to litigation services of the State from all spheres of government.
tgt_text: It will be applicable to litigation services of the State from all spheres of government.

src_text: Cabinet also approved the two additional policies to support the implementation of this strategy.
tgt_text: Cabinet also approved the two additional policies to support the implementation of this strategy.

src_text: The Briefing and Outsourcing of State Legal work Policy will introduce an element of fairness and drive the transformational allocation of litigation services that cannot be performed internally.
tgt_text: The Briefing and Outsourcing of State Legal work Policy will introduce an element of fairness and drive the transformational allocation of litigation services that cannot be performed internally.

src_text: The Initiating, Defending and Opposing of Matters Policy will provide clarity on processes to be followed by client departments and the Office of Solicitor-General.
tgt_text: The Initiating, Defending and Opposing of Matters Policy will provide clarity on processes to be followed by client departments and the Office of Solicitor-General.

src_text: The two policies – together with the other policies that were approved by Cabinet in November 2021 and the Legal Sector Code – will support the implementation of this strategy.
tgt_text: The two policies – together with the other policies that were approved by Cabinet in November 2021 and the Legal Sector Code – will support the implementation of this strategy.

src_text: These documents will ensure meaningful transformational intervention in the legal sector and also ensure the economies of scale in litigation matters that involve the State.
tgt_text: These documents will ensure meaningful transformational intervention in the legal sector and also ensure the economies of scale in litigation matters that involve the State.

src_text: Management of State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy.
tgt_text: Management of State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy.

src_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy, which provides mechanisms to manage state litigation contingent liability.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy, which provides mechanisms to manage state litigation contingent liability.

src_text: It provides for the creation of central database and the reporting mechanism on the following-up of the cases in this database.
tgt_text: It provides for the creation of central database and the reporting mechanism on the following-up of the cases in this database.

src_text: The policy provides for the mechanism to close dormant case files that were resulting in unreliable contingent liability figures in respect of accountability  Bills.
tgt_text: The policy provides for the mechanism to close dormant case files that were resulting in unreliable contingent liability figures in respect of accountability  Bills.

src_text: National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: The Bill amends the National Sport and Recreation Act, of 1998 (Act 110 of 1998).
tgt_text: The Bill amends the National Sport and Recreation Act, of 1998 (Act 110 of 1998).

src_text: The Bill has already been published for public consultation.
tgt_text: The Bill has already been published for public consultation.

src_text: The Bill also amends certain definitions and amongst other interventions, it proposes the establishment of the Sports Arbitration Tribunal to resolve disputes between sport or recreation bodies.
tgt_text: The Bill also amends certain definitions and amongst other interventions, it proposes the establishment of the Sports Arbitration Tribunal to resolve disputes between sport or recreation bodies.

src_text: It outlines procedures to be followed for bidding for international events.
tgt_text: It outlines procedures to be followed for bidding for international events.

src_text: The proposed amendments also empower the Minister of Sport, Arts and Culture to make regulations for vulnerable groups to participate in sport and be protected from any form of sexual abuse or exploitation.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments also empower the Minister of Sport, Arts and Culture to make regulations for vulnerable groups to participate in sport and be protected from any form of sexual abuse or exploitation.

src_text: South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of.
tgt_text: South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the SABC Bill of 2022 for processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the SABC Bill of 2022 for processing.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in June.
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in June.

src_text: Once the Bill is passed into law by Parliament, the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999) will be repealed.
tgt_text: Once the Bill is passed into law by Parliament, the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999) will be repealed.

src_text: The Bill amongst others proposes reducing the size of non-executive Board members from 12 to 11 and the executive members from three to two.
tgt_text: The Bill amongst others proposes reducing the size of non-executive Board members from 12 to 11 and the executive members from three to two.

src_text: It revised the governance structure and funding model of the SABC.
tgt_text: It revised the governance structure and funding model of the SABC.

src_text: Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of.
tgt_text: Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of 2022 for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: The Bill repeals the Transkeian Penal Code, 1983 (Act 9 of 1983) which codified criminal law in the former Transkei (now Eastern Cape).
tgt_text: The Bill repeals the Transkeian Penal Code, 1983 (Act 9 of 1983) which codified criminal law in the former Transkei (now Eastern Cape).

src_text: The proposed Bill extends the current application of common laws to the former Republic of Transkei in line with our unitary system of the country’s judicial system..
tgt_text: The proposed Bill extends the current application of common laws to the former Republic of Transkei in line with our unitary system of the country’s judicial system..

src_text: The Transkeian Penal Code is in conflict with the current common criminal law that regulates the same subject matter in different parts of the country.
tgt_text: The Transkeian Penal Code is in conflict with the current common criminal law that regulates the same subject matter in different parts of the country.

src_text: This repeal will remove the continued existence of apartheid-era legislation in the areas that were formerly known as the Republic of Transkei and provide the transitional arrangements on matters dealt with by this code.
tgt_text: This repeal will remove the continued existence of apartheid-era legislation in the areas that were formerly known as the Republic of Transkei and provide the transitional arrangements on matters dealt with by this code.

src_text: Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: The Bill amends Section 6 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 to recognise South African Sign Language as one of the official languages.
tgt_text: The Bill amends Section 6 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 to recognise South African Sign Language as one of the official languages.

src_text: In May 2022, Cabinet approved the publication and giving of notice to this Bill, which together with the notice were subsequently gazetted in July.
tgt_text: In May 2022, Cabinet approved the publication and giving of notice to this Bill, which together with the notice were subsequently gazetted in July.

src_text: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of this Bill for public comments.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of this Bill for public comments.

src_text: It repeals the Sexual Offences Act (previously Immorality Act), 1957 (Act 23 of 1957).
tgt_text: It repeals the Sexual Offences Act (previously Immorality Act), 1957 (Act 23 of 1957).

src_text: It also repeals Section 11 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offenses and Related Matters) Amendment Act, 2007 (Act 32 of 2007) to decriminalise the sale and purchase of adult sexual services.
tgt_text: It also repeals Section 11 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offenses and Related Matters) Amendment Act, 2007 (Act 32 of 2007) to decriminalise the sale and purchase of adult sexual services.

src_text: The proposals of this Bill respond to the list of interventions proposed in Pillar 3 (Protection, Safety and Justice) of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which enjoins the criminal justice system to provide protection, safety and justice for survivors of GBVF, and to effectively hold perpetrators accountable for their actions.
tgt_text: The proposals of this Bill respond to the list of interventions proposed in Pillar 3 (Protection, Safety and Justice) of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which enjoins the criminal justice system to provide protection, safety and justice for survivors of GBVF, and to effectively hold perpetrators accountable for their actions.

src_text: Once passed into law, it will amongst others protect sex workers against abuse and exploitation.
tgt_text: Once passed into law, it will amongst others protect sex workers against abuse and exploitation.

src_text: South African Post Office (SAPO) Amendment Bill.
tgt_text: South African Post Office (SAPO) Amendment Bill.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the SAPO Amendment Bill to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the SAPO Amendment Bill to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: The Bill, which was approved for public consultation early this year, amends the SAPO Act, 2011 (Act 22 of 2011).
tgt_text: The Bill, which was approved for public consultation early this year, amends the SAPO Act, 2011 (Act 22 of 2011).

src_text: The proposed amendments seek to enable the SAPO to adapt to the technological developments in the courier-service space and expand its mandate.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments seek to enable the SAPO to adapt to the technological developments in the courier-service space and expand its mandate.

src_text: The changes are in line with the National Integrated Information and Communications Technology Policy White Paper of  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: The changes are in line with the National Integrated Information and Communications Technology Policy White Paper of  Upcoming events.

src_text: 2022 World Science Forum (WSF).
tgt_text: 2022 World Science Forum (WSF).

src_text: South Africa will, through the DSI, host the WSF at the Cape Town International Convention Centre Cape from 6 to 9 December 2022 under the theme: “Science for Social Justice”.
tgt_text: South Africa will, through the DSI, host the WSF at the Cape Town International Convention Centre Cape from 6 to 9 December 2022 under the theme: “Science for Social Justice”.

src_text: The forum is one of the leading global platforms that encourage dialogue on the role science should play in society.
tgt_text: The forum is one of the leading global platforms that encourage dialogue on the role science should play in society.

src_text: It is an initiative of global science organisations that also include the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation.
tgt_text: It is an initiative of global science organisations that also include the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation.

src_text: Renowned thought leaders will be debating various topics that include science for human dignity; science for climate justice, science diplomacy for multilateralism, and science for Africa and the world number of side and satellite events will take place concurrently, and some of them will be hosted by the General Assembly of the African Academy of Sciences Pan-African organisation whose vision is to transform lives on the African continent through science.
tgt_text: Renowned thought leaders will be debating various topics that include science for human dignity; science for climate justice, science diplomacy for multilateralism, and science for Africa and the world number of side and satellite events will take place concurrently, and some of them will be hosted by the General Assembly of the African Academy of Sciences Pan-African organisation whose vision is to transform lives on the African continent through science.

src_text: World AIDS Day.
tgt_text: World AIDS Day.

src_text: South Africa will join the world in observing and participating in activities to mark the annual World AIDS Day on 1 December 2022 under the theme: “Equalise and Integrate to End AIDS”.
tgt_text: South Africa will join the world in observing and participating in activities to mark the annual World AIDS Day on 1 December 2022 under the theme: “Equalise and Integrate to End AIDS”.

src_text: The national commemoration event that will be held at the Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium in Bloemfontein in the Free State will be used to remind everyone to be responsible by getting to know their health status so as to make informed life decisions.
tgt_text: The national commemoration event that will be held at the Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium in Bloemfontein in the Free State will be used to remind everyone to be responsible by getting to know their health status so as to make informed life decisions.

src_text: The commemoration comes as South Africa prepares to begin piloting the injectable pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) early next year, which is recommended by the World Health Organisation.
tgt_text: The commemoration comes as South Africa prepares to begin piloting the injectable pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) early next year, which is recommended by the World Health Organisation.

src_text: The PrEP injection, to be taken every other month, could prevent as many as 52 000 new HIV infections.
tgt_text: The PrEP injection, to be taken every other month, could prevent as many as 52 000 new HIV infections.

src_text: Reconciliation Day.
tgt_text: Reconciliation Day.

src_text: On Friday, 16 December 2022, the nation will celebrate Reconciliation Day to reaffirm our commitment to unity and nation-building.
tgt_text: On Friday, 16 December 2022, the nation will celebrate Reconciliation Day to reaffirm our commitment to unity and nation-building.

src_text: Each year we have an opportunity to reach out to one another to deal with our past, reconcile and build new nation going forward.
tgt_text: Each year we have an opportunity to reach out to one another to deal with our past, reconcile and build new nation going forward.

src_text: Our journey since the advent of freedom and democracy in 1994 has decisively shown that we are stronger as nation when we are united.
tgt_text: Our journey since the advent of freedom and democracy in 1994 has decisively shown that we are stronger as nation when we are united.

src_text: Our goal as South Africans should be to promote inclusive nation-building and social cohesion.
tgt_text: Our goal as South Africans should be to promote inclusive nation-building and social cohesion.

src_text: Together we can build better tomorrow for all by striving to ensure nation that encourages dialogue, fosters social cohesion, embraces nation-building and celebrates its diverse culture.
tgt_text: Together we can build better tomorrow for all by striving to ensure nation that encourages dialogue, fosters social cohesion, embraces nation-building and celebrates its diverse culture.

src_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to work together as nation, and harness our collective strengths to build united and prosperous South Africa.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to work together as nation, and harness our collective strengths to build united and prosperous South Africa.

src_text: National Active Ageing Programme.
tgt_text: National Active Ageing Programme.

src_text: The Department of Social Development will host the National Active Ageing Programme in Germiston, Gauteng from 5 to 7 December.
tgt_text: The Department of Social Development will host the National Active Ageing Programme in Germiston, Gauteng from 5 to 7 December.

src_text: The programme brings all nine provinces together and is aimed at promoting the independent and healthy lifestyle of older persons to ensure that they actively participate in their communities.
tgt_text: The programme brings all nine provinces together and is aimed at promoting the independent and healthy lifestyle of older persons to ensure that they actively participate in their communities.

src_text: The National Active Ageing Programme will open with national dialogue to allow older persons to engage on pertinent matters affecting them.
tgt_text: The National Active Ageing Programme will open with national dialogue to allow older persons to engage on pertinent matters affecting them.

src_text: This will be followed by the Golden Games where older persons will showcase their athletic abilities.
tgt_text: This will be followed by the Golden Games where older persons will showcase their athletic abilities.

src_text: The Older Persons Act, 2006 (Act 13 of 2006) emphasises the importance of the protection and promotion of the rights, dignity, status, integrity, safety, security and well-being of older persons.
tgt_text: The Older Persons Act, 2006 (Act 13 of 2006) emphasises the importance of the protection and promotion of the rights, dignity, status, integrity, safety, security and well-being of older persons.

src_text: In this regard, Cabinet calls upon all communities to care, respect and support older persons, especially against abuse, ill-treatment, neglect and GBV  MessagesCongratulations.
tgt_text: In this regard, Cabinet calls upon all communities to care, respect and support older persons, especially against abuse, ill-treatment, neglect and GBV  MessagesCongratulations.

src_text: Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Prize winners of the 2022 SADC Media Awards.
tgt_text: Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Prize winners of the 2022 SADC Media Awards.

src_text: Mr Sandile Stevenson Ndlovu from the Sunday Times for first prize in the photographic category, Ms Zinhle Makhosazane Mugabe from SABC for the second prize in the TV category and  Ms Melinda Shaw from the Poultry Bulletin Magazine for third prize in the Print category.Condolences.
tgt_text: Mr Sandile Stevenson Ndlovu from the Sunday Times for first prize in the photographic category, Ms Zinhle Makhosazane Mugabe from SABC for the second prize in the TV category and  Ms Melinda Shaw from the Poultry Bulletin Magazine for third prize in the Print category.Condolences.

src_text: Cabinet extended its condolences to the friends and families of:Mr John Henry Ernstzen (82) veteran trade unionist and political activist who also served in the Public Service as an advisor to the then Minister of Public Service and Administration, Dr Zola Skweyiya.
tgt_text: Cabinet extended its condolences to the friends and families of:Mr John Henry Ernstzen (82) veteran trade unionist and political activist who also served in the Public Service as an advisor to the then Minister of Public Service and Administration, Dr Zola Skweyiya.

src_text: He later served on the Public Service Commission as Deputy Chairperson and also on the Judicial Service Commission.Vho-Rashaka Frank Ratshitanga (89), an anti-apartheid activist who endured number of Security Branch harassments.

src_text: As published author, some of his many poetry books were prescribed for high school.

src_text: After 1994, he served in the Limpopo Legislature.

src_text: Inkhulumo yaMengameli Yebunjalo BaleLive (i-SoNA).
tgt_text: Mbulavulo wa Xiyimo xa Rixaka (SoNA).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise simemo lesikhulu Mengameli President Cyril Ramaphosa lasente eNkhulumeni yakhe yeBunjalo Belive yanga-2023 kutsi bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika basebente ngekubambisana bangashiyi muntfu ngemuva lapho sibukana netinsayeya tentfu letisicindzetelako.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tiyisise hi vuntshwa xikombelo lexi nga erivaleni xa Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa lexi xi endleke eka Mbulavulo wa yena wa Xiyimo xa Rixaka eka vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga hinkwavo ku tirhisana na ku nga siyi munhu endzhaku loko hi ri karhi hi tirhana na mitlhontlho leyi tshikelelaka ya tiko ra ka hina.

src_text: Tinyatselo taMengameli letibalulekile tekubeka ludzaba lwagezi embili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekusebenta lwemnyaka kutsi kubukwane futsi kuncotjwe cimicimi bese kucinisekiswa kuba khona kwagezi losimeme..   Ikhabhinethi icele yonkhe imikhakha yemmango kutsi yesekele lemitamo levetwe ku-SoNA nguMengameli, indlala kanye nekukhuphuka kwetindleko tekuphila kanye nekulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo.
tgt_text: Magoza lama xitiyanhlana ya Phuresidente ya veke eneji emahlweni ka kungu ra matirhelo ra mfumo ra lembe ku tirhana hi ndlela fikisaka emakumu ntirhiso wa gezi hi ku siyerisana na ku sirhelela mphakelo wa eneji lowu yisekaka emahlweni..   Khabinete yi hlohlotele tisekitara hinkwato ta rixaka ku seketela mapfhumba lama katsakanyiweke eka SoNA hi Phuresidente, lama ma nga ya nkoka swonghasi eka ku yisa emahlweni matshalatshala ya hina ku hunguta mpfumaleko wa mitirho, vusweti na ndhurho lowu tlakukaka wa ku hanya xikan'we na ku herisa vugevenga na vukungundzwana.

src_text: Hulumende utimisele kuphutfumisa umsebenti lesewuvele wentiwa wekukhulisa umtsamo wagezi kugridi yavelonkhe futsi umsebenti kususa nanoma ngusiphi sihibe senchubelembili.
tgt_text: Mfumo wu tiyimiserile ku hatlisisa ntirho lowu se wu nga eku endliweni ku engetela mphakelo wa eneji eka giridi ya rixaka nawona xintirhwana xa hina ku susa swirhalanganyi eka ndzima yaleyo.

src_text: Kulamaviki letako, tingcoco teticheme titawuniketa lwatiso lolubanti mayelana neLuhlelo Lwekusebenta lwahulumende (i-PoA) yalomnyaka lotako, njengobe Mengameli Ramaphosa akugcamisile ku-SoNA.
tgt_text: Eka mavhiki mangarimangani lama landzelaka, ku nyikiwa ka vuxokoxoko ka mitlawa ku ta nyika vuxokoxoko byo tala hi mayelana na Nongoloko wa Matirhelo (PoA) wa mfumo wa lembe leri hi nga kongomana na rona, tanihilaha swi kombisiweke hakona hi Phuresidente Ramaphosa eka SoNA.

src_text: Sabelomali Savelonkhe lesitawetfulwa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-22 Indlovana 2023 sitawuniketa lolunye lwatiso mayelana ne-PoA.
tgt_text: Mpimanyeto wa Rixaka lowu faneleke ku andlariwa hi Ravunharhu, 22 Nyenyanyana wu ta nyika vuxokoxoko byo yisa emahlweni hi mayelana na PoA ya mfumo.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika yanga-.
tgt_text: Ntsombano wa Vucelamigodi wa Afrika wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyinakile imiphumela yeNgcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika lebeyibanjelwe e-International Convention Centre eKapa kusukela mhla ti-6 kuya kumhla ti-9 Indlovana 2023 ngaphasi kwendzikimba letsi:“Kuvula Lutjalomali Lwetimayini Lwase-Afrika: Lutinto, Kuvikeleka kanye Nekuphakela”.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tekele enhlokweni mivuyelo ya Ntsombano wa Vucelamigodi wa Afrika lowu khomeriweke eCape Town International Convention Centre kusuka 6 kufika 9 Nyenyanyana 2023 ehansi ka nkongomelo: “Ku Pfulela Vuvekisi bya Vucelamigodi bya Afrika: Ntshamiseko, Nsirhelelo na Mphakelo”.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika ihlanganise badlali betimboni labavela kulo lonkhe lelivekati kanye nakumhlaba wonkhe, yaphindze futsi yacinisa indzawo yayo njengengcungcutsela lehamba embili yekutjalwa kwetimali kutetimayini kulelivekati.
tgt_text: Ntsombano wa Vucelamigodi wa Afrika wu tise endhawini yin'we vatlangi va indasitiri kusuka eka tikokulu na le misaveni hinkwayo, naswona ri tiyise ndhawu ya wona tanihi khomferensekulu ya vuvekisi bya vucelamigodi eka tikokulu leri.

src_text: Tetimayini tiyachubeka nekudlala indzima lebaluleke kakhulu ekutfutfukisweni nasekutfutfukisweni kwetimboni kulo lonkhe lelivekati.
tgt_text: Vucelamigodi byi ya emahlweni byi tlanga xiave xa nkoka eka nhluvukiso na vuendlatifeme eka tikokulu hinkwaro xihoxaxandla xa nkoka eka ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho na ku hlayisiwa ka vatirhi, leswi endlaka ekusuhi na hafu ya miliyoni ya mitirho yo kongoma na le kusuhi na miliyoni ya mitirho leyi nga kongomiki eAfrika-Dzonga.

src_text: Tingumfakigalelo lobalulekile ekwakheni ematfuba emsebenti, takha ematfuba emisebenti-ngco lecishe ibe yihhafu yesigidzi nemisebenti lengakacondzi-ngco lecishe ibe sigidzi lapha eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Vuhumesi bya vucelamigodi eAfrika-Dzonga n'wexemu byi fikilerile rhekodo ya le henhla ya  18 wa tithiriliyoni, leswi nyikaka matimba eka xikumiwa xa tiko hinkwaxo, tinhundzu leti rhumeriwaka ematikweni mambe na malinhlengeleto.

src_text: Umkhicito wetetimayini lapha eNingizimu Afrika kulomnyaka lophelile kulinani lelisetulu lemathriliyoni la-R. 18, lokukhulise samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP), imikhicito letsengiselwa lamanye emave kanye nemalingena.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi kombela vatlangaxiave hinkwavo lava nga eka indasitiri leyi ku ya emahlweni va tirhisana na mfumo ku humelerisa indasitiri leyi phikizanaka emisaveni hinkwayo leyi yi nyikaka matimba eka ku kula ka ikhonomi, leyi yi tumbuluxaka mitirho na ku lawula nhluvukiso lowu yisekaka emahlweni.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe badlalindzima kulemboni kutsi bachubeke nekusebentisana nahulumende kute kutsi kwakheke imboni yetetimayini lecudzelanako lefukula kukhula kwemnoto, yakhe ematfuba emisebenti kanye nekuchuba  intfutfuko lesimeme.
tgt_text: Mikhukhulo.

src_text: Tikhukhula.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka mindyangu leyi yi lahlekeriweke hi varhandziwa eka mikhukhulo leyi onhetelaka leya ha ku vaka kona leyi yi hlaseleke swiphemu swo talanyana swa tiko ra ka hina..   Hi khensa vukorhokeri bya xilamulelamhangu na mponiso etikweni hinkwaro lebyi byi tirheke byi nga karhali ku ponisa vutomi hi hlanganeni tanihi rixaka kutani hi nyika mpfuneto eka lavaya va nga na xidingo xa hiseko xa nhlayiso na nseketelo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela imindeni leshonelwe tihlobo tayo kuletikhukhula letimbi letisandza kuba khona etincenyeni letinyenti talelive..   Sibonga betinsita tetfu tekuphalala bakulo lonkhe lelive labasebente ngekutikhandla kute basindzise bantfu.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi hlohlotele vanhu ku tshama endzeni ka miako eka swiyimo swa timpfula ta matimba na maxelo ya mabubutsa, naswona yi tsundzuxe lavaya va tshamaka etindhawini leti ti nga ehansi ku va na vuxiyaxiya swinene..   Vanhu va lemukisiwa ku nga fambi hi milenge, ku nga khidi kumbe ku chayela ku tsemakanya mati ya nkhukhulo lama tsutsumaka hi rivilo kumbe ku tsemakanya magondzo mabiloho na milambu leswi khukhuriweke.

src_text: Asibambisaneni sisive sisite laba labadzinga kakhulu kunakekelwa nekwesekelwa.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi hlohlotele vaaki ku tiyisisa leswaku vana mikarhi hinkwayo va hlayisekile leswaku va nga dyiwi hi mati hi mikarhi leya mikhukhulo..   Madzolonga ya swibalesa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bantfu kutsi bahlale ekhaya uma kuna timvula letinamandla nakanye uma kunesiphepho, iphindze yakhumbuta labo labahlala etindzaweni letiphasi kutsi bacaphelisise..   Bantfu bacasheliswa kutsi bangahambi ngetinyawo, bangabhukushi noma-ke bangahambi ngetimoto emantini etikhukhula lageleta ngemandla futsi bangayeweli imigwaco, emabhuloho kanye nemifula legcwele.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va mutshila wa hipi-hopo Ttn Kiernan Forbes, loyi dumile tanihi AKA, na musweki wa ndhuma Ttn Tebello Motsoane, lava va ha ku dlawaka hi ku baleseriwa eDurban..   Khabinete yi tlhele yi hundzisa ntwelavusiwana wa yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va mugingirikeli wo lwisana na vugevenga Ttn Ayob Mungalee, loyi ha ku dlawaka eEldorado Park eJoni ri mulawuri wa rixaka wa Ntlawa wa Vanhu lava Lavaka Magoza ya Vululami, nhlangano lowu wu hlohloteleke vaaki va le migangeni ku sirhelela mavonelo ya vona ehenhla vunsulavoya na vuxavisi bya swidzidziharisi..   Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka mindyangu na vanghana va lavaya va dlaweke eka ku baleseriwa ka ntshungu loku ka ha ku vaka kona eKapa-Vupeladyambu, KwaZulu-Natal na Kapa-Vuhumadyambu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse ummango kutsi ucinisekise kutsi bantfwana bahlala ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi baphephile ekuncwileni ngetikhatsi tetikhukhula..   Budlova betibhamu.
tgt_text: Mihlaselo leya tihanyi na ku va ya lava nga tilweriki, leyi yi nga eku lavisisiweni hi vulawuri bya nsindziso wa nawu, yi kombisa vukona bya madzolonga ya swibalesa na nkhumbo wa swona emigangeni.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela umndeni nebangani beliciko le-hip-hop uMnu.
Kiernan Forbes, lobekadvume ngelekutsi ngu-AKA, kanye nasowatiwako ongumpheki uMnu.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tshembise vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga leswaku Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa bya Afrika-Dzonga (SAPS) byi le ku tiyisiweni ku kota ku sivela vugevenga.

src_text: Tebello Motsoane, labasandza kudutjulwa bashona eThekwini..   Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yavakalisa kuvelana nemindeni nebangani besishikashiki lesilwa nebugebengu uMnu.
tgt_text: Leswi swi katsa ku rhumela maphorisa yo tala eswitarateni na ku simeka swipano leswi tirhaka hi ku kongomisa leswi swi nga ta kongomisa eka mixaka yo karhi ya vugevenga.

src_text: Ayob Mungalee, losandza kudutjulwa washona e-Eldorado Park eJozi.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi ta tlhela yi tirhisa maendlelo lama lawuriwaka hi switiviwa hi ndlela yo pfilungana swinene ku kuma na ku pakanisa tindhawu ta khombo ta vugevenga..   SAPS yi le ku tiyiseni mitirho ku thumba na ku susa swibalesa leswi nga riki enawini na maqulu emavokweni ya swigevenga.

src_text: Bekangumcondzisi wavelonkhe we-People Seeking Justice Action Group, umbutfo lobuhlanganisa emalunga emmango kutsi alwe nebugebengu lobuchutjwa ngemacembu ebugebengu kanye nekusetjentiswa kwetidzakamiva..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani balabo labasandza kubulawa etigamekweni tekudubulana kwebantfu labanyenti eNyakatfo Kapa, eKwaZulu-Natal naseMphumalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Maphorisa eka 12 wa tin'hweti nga hundza ma susile ramakumu 65 519 wa swibalesa eka ndzhendzeleko..   Mfumo wu kombela vaakatiko hinkwavo na swivumbeko swa le migangeni ku tirhisana na SAPS ya le migangeni ya ka vona ku hlongola vugevenga emigangeni.

src_text: Lokuhlasela lokunelunya kangaka nalokungenaluvelo, lokuphenywa baphenyi betemtsetfo, kugcamisa kubhebhetseka kwebudlova betibhamu kanye nemtselela wako lomubi emimangweni yetfu.
tgt_text: Loko ri na vuxokoxoko lebyi yi nga pfunaka ku paluxa vanhu lava khumbekaka eka migingiriko leyi nga riki enawini, bela riqingho eka Crime Stop eka 0800. .
Masipala wa Miganga wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekisa bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi Luphiko Lwetemisebenti Yemaphoyisa LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) kungunyalo luyaciniswa kute luvikele bugebengu.
tgt_text: Holobye wa Mfumontirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma na Holobye wa Timali Enoch Godongwana va nyike Khabinete vuxokoxoko hi mayelana na mivulavurisano yo kanela leya ha ku vaka kona leyi khomiweke hi vatlangaxiavenkulu na vakomaxiavenkulu eka EMLM.

src_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi kubekwa kwemaphoyisa lamanengi emigwacweni nekusungula ematsimba lakhetsekile latawugcila etihlotjeni letitsite tebugebengu.
tgt_text: Hi Dzivamisoko 2022, Khabinete yi pasise mphalalo eka EMLM hi ku landza Xiyenge xa 139(7) xa Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga ra 1996, leri hlayiwaka swin'we na Xiyenge xa 150 Nawu wa Malawulelo ya Timali ta Masipala, 2003 (Nawu wa 56 wa 2003).

src_text: INingizimu Afrika futsi itawusebentisa tindlela letisuselwe kulwati loluvela kulucwaningo kutfola nekucondza-ngco tindzawo letihamba embili ngekuba nebugebengu..   I-SAPS icinisa kusebenta kwayo kutfola nekwemuka tigebengu tibhamu netinhlavu tato letingekho emtsetfweni.
tgt_text: EMLM yi hlanganile na mihluleko ya timali na ya mphakelo wa vukorhokeri yo tivikana ku ringana nkarhi wo leha ku nga si va na mphalalo lowu..   Khabinete yi hundzise ku tekela ka yona enhlokweni swiphiqo leswo tivikana leswi kumiweke hi vakhomaxiave naswona yi tshembise vatshami va ka EMLM leswaku xiboho hi mayelana na hilaha ku faneleke ku tirhaniwa hakona na mitlhontlho ya masipala lowu xi ta tivisiwa kungari khale..   Vuhlayiseki eswikolweni.

src_text: Kuletinyanga leti-12 letendlulile emaphoyisa atsatse ulomphela tibhamu letingekho emtsetfweni leti-65.
tgt_text: Vuhlayiseki bya le swikolweni eAfrika-Dzonga byi tshama bya ha ri xirhangana xa le henhla eka mfumo naswona swiviko swa madzolonga exikarhi ka vadyondzi na vadyondzisi xivangelo xo tivikana xa ku vilela.

Loko Ndzawulo ya Dyondzo ya Masungulo yi vekile tindlela leti tirhisiwaka ku herisa mpingu lowu vutihlamuleri bya vatswari na vahlayisi ku tirhisana na vulawuri bya swikolo na vadyondzi ku tiyisisa leswaku swikolo swi tshama swi ri tindhawu leti hlayisekeke eka vadyondzi va ka hina ku hluvukisa na ku va vaakatiko lava nga na vutihlamuleri.

src_text: Hulumende umema tonkhe takhamuti netinhlangano temmango kutsi basebentisane ne-SAPS yabo yendzawo kucedza bugebengu emimangweni yabo.
tgt_text: Vuhlayiseki bya vadyondzi va ka hina eswikolweni byi tlhela byi va bya nkoka swonghasi.

src_text: Uma ngabe unelwatiso lolungasita ludzalule bantfu lababandzakanyeka etentweni tebugebengu, shayela inombolo ye-Crime Stop ku-0800.
tgt_text: Vuhlayiseki bya le Magondzweni.
Khabinete yi tshama ya ha vilerisiwa hi mpimo wa mafu ya le magondzweni etikweni hinkwaro.

src_text: Masipala Wendzawo I-Enoch Mgijima (i-EMLM).
tgt_text: Mfumo wu ta valanga milawu yintshwa ku sivela mitlumbano ya titiraka, wun'wana wa yona wu katsa ku tleketla nhundzu kusuka egondzweni kuya exiporweni hi ku tshemba leswaku leswi swi ta susa ntshikelelo eka vutleketlanhundzu bya le magondzweni.

src_text: Indvuna yeTekubusa Ngekubambisana Netendzabuko Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma akanye neNdvuna yeTetimali Enoch Godongwana batise Ikhabhinethi ngetingcoco letisandza kubanjwa nebadlalindzima nalabatsintsekako abakhulu e-EMLM.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi kombela vatirhisi va magondzo hinkwavo ku landzelela milawu ya gondzo hi ku va na vuxiyaxiya, va ehleketelela van'wana na ku lehisela vatirhisi van'wana va gondzo mbilu.

src_text: NgaMabasa 2022, Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungenelela e-EMLM ngekwembandzela weSigaba se-139(7) weMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika yanga-1996, lofundvwa kanye neSigaba se-150 seMtsetfo Wetekulawulwa Kwetimali Tamasipala, wanga-2003 (Umtsetfo we-56 wanga-2003).
tgt_text: Vachayeri lava nga ehansi ka nhlohlotelo wa xihoko kumbe swidzidziharisi xikan'we na machayelelo lama nga landzeleriki milawu na ku va ya vusopfa, ku katsa na ku chayela hi rivilo, va na vutihlamuleri bya tinghozi ta le magondzweni to tala   Milawumbisi.

src_text: Le-EMLM beyiloku ihlangabetana nekufadabala lokukhulu kwetetimali nekwetfulwa kwetinsita sikhatsi lesidze ngembi kwelungenelelo..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga kwayo mayelana naletinkinga letinkhulu letikhonjwe badlalindzima futsi seyicinisekise bahlali base-EMLM masinyane-nje batawatiswa ngesincumo lesitsetfwe mayelana nekulungiswa kwaletinsayeya tamasipala letikhona kwanyalo..   Tekuphepha etikolweni.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wa Hofisi ya le Ndzilakanini leyi nga Vukorhokeri Hinkwabyo (OSBP) wa.

src_text: Tekuphepha etikolweni taseNingizimu Afrika kusachubeka nekubekwa embili kuhulumende futsi nemibiko yebudlova emkhatsini webafundzi nebafundzisi kuyintfo lebanga kukhatsateka lokukhulu.
tgt_text: habinete yi pasise Nawumbisi wa OSBP leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo.

src_text: Nanoma-nje Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo limise ngemumo tindlela tekulwa nalesihlava, kusibopho sebatali nababheki bebantfwana kutsi basebentisane netiphatsimandla tetikolwa kanye nebafundzi kucinisekisa kutsi tikolwa tihlala titindzawo letiphephile lapho bafundzi betfu batitfutfukisa khona baphindze futsi babe takhamuti leticotfo.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu landzela mpasiso wa Pholisi ya OSBP na qhinga ra ntirhiso wa yona hi Nyenyakulu.

src_text: Kuphepha kwabothishela betfu etikolweni nako kubaluleke kakhulu.
tgt_text: Wu lava ku xakelanisa mfambamfambo wa vanhu na tinhundzu exikarhi ka tindhawu to nghena etikweni ta Afrika-Dzonga na matikoakelana ya yona..   Leswi swi ta hunguta mitlimbano ya nkarhi wa sweswi eka tindhawu ta ka hina to nghena etikweni ta le misaveni ta vatekarendzo na vabindzurisi lava tsemakanyaka mindzilakano.

src_text: Kuphepha emigwacweni.
tgt_text: Miphalalo leyi yi ta tlhela yi va ya nkoka eka matshalatshala ya tiko eka ku lawula Ntwanano wa Ndhawu ya Mabindzu ya Nkaswipimelo ya Tikokulu ya Afrika (AfCFTA)..   Mitwanano leyi anakanyiwaka eka Nawumbisi lowu yi ta tiyisisa leswaku ku phurosesiwa ka tinhundzu, swipandzamananga na vanhu swi va leswi nga riki na mikavanyeto naswona swi va leswi hatlisaka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekukhatsateka ngekukhuphuka kwelizinga lekufa kwebantfu emigwacweni yakulo lonkhe lelive.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu tlhela wu angula eka mitwanano ya xinawu ya matiko ya misava leyi fambelanaka leyi yi khumbaka vuhumelerisi bya mabindzu, na mifambafambo ya vanhu na tinhundzu..     Nawumbisi wa Vutitivisi na Ntsariso swa Rixaka wa.

src_text: Hulumende utawehlwaya imitsetfo lemisha yekucedza tingoti temaloli, munye wayo ufaka ekhatsi kususa kutsi imphahla itfutswe ngemaloli kodvwa itfutswe ngesitimela, ngelitsemba lekutsi loku kutawuhhamula incindzetelo yekuhambisa imphahla ngemgwaco.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku kandziyisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Vutitivisi na Ntsariso swa Rixaka wa 2022 leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incusa bonkhe basebentisi bemigwaco kutsi batfobele imitsetfo yemgwaco ngekutsi bacilike, bacabangele baphindze futsi babeketelelane.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu humelerisa Pholisi ya Malawulelo ya Vutitivisi bya Ximfumo naswona wu lava ku nyika sisiteme ya vutitivisi bya rixaka eka vanhu hinkwavo lava va tshamaka kumbe lava va tshama etikweni leri..   Nawumbisi lowa mpfapfarhuto nhlengeleto na vulunghisi bya rhijisitara ra vanhu hinkwavo ra vaakatiko na vatshami va nkarhi hinkwawo.

src_text: Bashayeli labashayela sebanatse tjwala noma tidzakamiva kanye nekushayela lokungakhatsali nalokunganakekeli, kufaka ekhatsi kushayela ngelitubane lelikhulu, ngiko lokubangela tingoti temgwaco letinyenti   Imitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Wu ya emahlweni wu lulamisela ku tumbuluxiwa ka databesi ya vutitivisi ya vahlapfa vo karhi lava va pfhumbelaka etikweni leri swa nkarhinyana.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekusetjentiswa Kwemnyele Lowodvwa(i-OSBP) wanga-.
tgt_text: Wu tlhela wu lulamisela Sisiteme ya Vutitivisi ya Rixaka (NIS) ya xibayometiriki leyi yi nga ta kotisa vonakelo rin'we ra munhu hi ku lulamisela vuxokoxoko lebyi faneleke ku katsiwa eka rhijisitara ra vanhu hinkwavo na databesi ya vutitivisi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ummango uphawule ngeMtsetfosivivinyo we-OSBP.
tgt_text: NIS leyi yi ta tlhela yi kotisa ku hlangana ka tisisiteme ta vutitivisi ta mfumo na ta sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo..   Havumbirhi bya Nawumbisi wa OSBP wa 2022 na Nawumbisi wa Vutitivisi na Ntsariso swa Rixaka wa 2022 yi ta kandziyisiwa eka webusayiti ya Ndzawulo ya Timhaka ta Xikaya: www.dha.gov.za.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinyo ulandzela kuvunywa kweNchubomgomo ye-OSBP kanye nekucala kwayo kusetjentiswa ngeNdlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Vaaki va khutaziwa ku rhumela swibumabumelo swo tsariwa eka adirese leyi landzelaka: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.

src_text: Uhlose kutsi kube nekuhleleka kahle kuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla emkhatsini wematubuko ekungena eNingizimu Afrika kanye nasemaveni labomakhelwane bayo..   Loku kutawuhhamula lesiminyeminye lesikhona kwanyalo ematubukweni etfu ekungena nekuphuma bahambi nebahwebi.
tgt_text: Riq: 012 406   Swiendleko leswi Taka.

src_text: Letingenelelo tiphindze futsi tibe nguletibalulekile emitameni yalelive ekuchubekiseleni embili Sivumelwane Sendzawo Yeluhwebelana Ngalokukhulekile Kulelivekati Lase-Afrika (i-AfCFTA)..   Letivumelwane letilindzelwe kuloMtsetfosivivinyo titawucinisekisa kutsi kucutjungulwa kwemphahla, timoto kanye nebantfu kute tihibe kantsi futsi kuyashesha.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Yuniyoni ya Afrika (AU).

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphendvula tindlela temtsetfo temave emhlaba letifanele letiphatselene tekuchutjwa kweluhwebo kanye nekuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla.
tgt_text: Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ta ya eka Sexini ya Ntolovelo ya vu36 ya Huvo ya Varhangeri va Tiko na Mfumo ya AU leyi nga ta khomiwa kusuka 18 kufika 19 Nyenyanyana eAddis Ababa, Ethiopia.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-.
tgt_text: Huvo ya AU, yi ta khomiwa ehansi ka nkongomelo wa “Hatlisiso wa Ntirhiso wa AfCFTA”, yi ta rhangeriwa hi Sexini ya Ntolovelo ya vu42 ya Khansele ya Vurhangerinkulu kusuka 15 kufika 16 Nyenyanyana.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-2022 kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Varhangeri va Tiko na Mfumo va AU va ta tirhisa nkongomelo lowu ku tiyisisa hi vuntshwa vutiboheleri bya vona eka ntirhiso wa AfCFTA..   Rendzo ra Tiko hi Phuresidente wa Uganda.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo unika Inchubomgomo Yekulawula Buwena Ngekwemtsetfo emandla uphindze futsi uhlose kwenta kutsi kube nenchubo yinye, lefaka konkhe ekhatsi futsi lehlanganisiwe ledijithali yekutatisa kwavelonkhe..   LoMtsetfosivivinyo loluhlaka wenta kutsi kube nekuhlanganiswa nekugcinwa kwerejista yetakhamuti nebahlali balomphelo.
tgt_text: Muchaviseki Phuresidente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda ta teka rendzo ra Tiko ku endzela eAfrika-Dzonga hi Ravumbirhi, 28 Nyenyanyana 2023, hi xirhambo xa ntangha yakwe hi ntirho, Phuresidente Ramaphosa.

src_text: Uphindze wente kutsi kwakhiwe luhlu lebachamuki labatsite labahleti kulelive kwesikhashana.
tgt_text: Xikongomelo xa Rendzo lera Tiko ku tiyisisa vuxaka bya matiko mambirhi exikarhi ka matiko lamambirhi.

src_text: Iphindze futsi yente kutsi kube neLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwebunguwe (i-NIS) lolusebenta ngekutsatsa iminwe lolutawenta kutsi kube nekumbona kunye  kwemuntfu  ngekufakae imininingwane kurejista yebantfu yavelonkhe kanye neluhlu lwemininingwane yebantfu.
tgt_text: Ri ta hetelela eka Foramu ya Mabindzu ku valanga tikontiraka ta mabindzu na ta vuvekisi exikarhi ka matiko lamambirhi..   Masagwadi ya Swihangalasamahungu ya Muganga wa Nhluvukiso wa le Dzongeni wa Afrika (SADC) ya 2023 .

src_text: I-NIS itawuphindze futsi ikwati kucobelelane netinchubo tekutatisa taleminye imikhakha lengaphasi kwahulumende kanye naletimele..   Kokubili i-OSBP yanga 2022 kanye neMtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-2022 kutawushicilelwa kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letasekhaya: www.dha.gov.za.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tsundzuka swihangalasamahungu hinkwaswo leswi vangheneri eka Masagwadi ya Swihangalasamahungu ya SADC ya 2023, lama pfalaka hi Ravumbirhi, 28 Nyenyanyana 2023, ya pfuriwile eka vatekamahungu kusuka eka matiko lama nga swirho swa SADC.

src_text: Emalunga emmango akhutsatwa kutsi atfumele kuphawula kwawo lokubhaliwe kulelikheli lelilandzelako: The Director-General of Home Affairs,, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.
tgt_text: Masagwadi ya Swihangalasamahungu ya SADC ya tekela enhlokweni ntirho wa swihangalasamahungu wa kahle swinene eka swiyenge hinkwaswo swa nkandziyiso, swinepe, thelevhixini na xiyanimoya eka ku hangalasa vuxokoxoko hi mayelana na SADC ku seketela phurosese ya ntirhiso wa xifundza na nhlanganiso exifundzeni lexi   Vuhoyozeri.

src_text: Lucingo: 012 406    Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi hundzise vuhoyozeri bya yona na ku navelela leswinene eka: Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini na Wouter Kellerman eka ku wina matlangelo ya vuyimbeleri bya misava ya kahle swinene ya risimu ra vona, Bayethe, eka Masagwadi ya Misava ya Lembe na Lembe ya vu   Michavelelo Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va: vanhu lava ha ku lovaka loko bazi ri tlumbana na xipandzamananga xo tleketla mali eka gondzokulu ra N1 eLimpopo.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeBunye be-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: Khabinete yi navelele lava loveke eka nghozi leyi nhlakarhelo wa xihatla.

src_text: Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa utawuhambela Ingcugcutsela Leyetayelekile ye-36 yeSigungu Sebaholi Bemave naHulumende we-AU letawubanjwa kusukela mhla ti-18 kuya kumhla ti-19 Indlovana 2023 e-Addis Ababa, e-Ethiopia.
tgt_text: John Moeti (56), khale ka mutlangi wa Bafana Bafana na Orlando Pirates, loyi ri xiphemu xa nkoka swonghasi xa xipano lexi nga wina Khapi ya Tinxaka ya Afrika ya 1996 .

src_text: Lomhlangano we-AU, lotawubanjwa ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi “Kuphutfunyiswa Kwekucala Kusebenta Kwe-AfCFTA”, kutawuchutjwa yiNGcungcutsela Leyetayelekile ye-42 yeMkhandlu Lomkhulu kusuka mhla ti-15 kuya kumhla ti-16 Indlovana.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tlhele yi humesa michavelelo eka mifumo na vanhu va le Türkiye na va le Syria lava va weriweke hi ndzahlekelo wa xikalo lexikulu wa vutomi na ku onhakeriwa lokukulu eka switirhisiwakulu swa vanhu na swa ikhonomi endzhaku ka n'wari lowo tikisa hi siku ra Nyenyanyana 2023 lowu pimeke.

src_text: Baholi Bemave Emhlaba Nahulumende we-AU batawusebentisa lengcikitsi kute bacinisekise kabusha kutinikela kwabo ekuphunyelelisweni ngalokuphelele kwe-AfCFTA..   Luvakasho Lwetemsebenti LwaMengameli wase-Uganda.
tgt_text: 8 eka Xikalo xa Richter.

src_text: Mhlonishwa Mengameli Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wase-Uganda utawungenela luhambo Lwembuso lwekuvakashela eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-28 Indlovana 2023, ngekutfobela simemo semlingani wakhe, Mengameli Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Hi khoma xikatla mindyangu leyi loveriweke hi varhandziwa kumbe leyi yi nga eku laveni ka maxaka.
