src_text: Iphindze ivumele kwakhiwa kwemisamo, ematje esikhumbuto, imitapolwati netilulu temilandvo, futsi ihlose kucaphela umoya welubumbano nekubambisana emkhatsini kwema-Afrika.
tgt_text: Yi tlhela yi lava ku tlakusa ku ringana na ku tiyisisa leswaku vavasati va kuma xichavo kumbe ku xiximiwa eka tlhelo ra swa phurofexini, ku katsa na miholo yo ringana na tintangha ta vona hi ntirho ta va xinuna.

src_text: Igunyatwe yi-UN futsi inemandla ekucinisa kubambisana emkhatsini webantfu kusetjentiswa lisiko nemagugu kulo lonkhe lelivekati..     Imisebenti leminyentana leyentiwe nga-2022 ifaka ekhatsi kuvakasha kweNdvuna eBotswana naseZimbabwe kanye nekuhlela imihlangano ne-Angola kanye neTanzania..     Imisebenti lemayelana nalomsebenti ihlose kuchumanisa onkhe emave aseNingizimu ne-Afrika futsi ifundzise bantfu labasha ngemzabalazo wekulwa nebukoloni kanye nekubandlululwa ngekwelibala.
tgt_text: Ku khomiwa ka Nhlengeletano ya Matiko ya Misava ya Rihanyo ra Vamanana na Vana lava ha ku Velekiwaka -.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo ngalokufanako ivumela kubuyiselwa ekhaya kwematsambo ebalweli benkhululeko baseNingizimu Afrika labangcwatjwa kulamanye emave.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi nyikile mpfumelelo wa leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela Nhlengeletano ya Matiko ya Misava ya Rihanyo ra Vamanana na Vana lava ha ku Velekiwaka eKapa ku sukela hi ti 8 ku fikela hi ti 11 Mudyaxihi 2023, laha ku tlula 1 000 wa vatekaxiave ku suka emisaveni hinkwayo va nga ta hlengeletana ku hatlisisa swintshuxo swo antswisa ku hanya ka vamanana na vana lava ha ku velekiwaka, na ku sivela ku velekiwa ka vana va lovile.

src_text: Kunemangcwaba lalinganiselwa kula-11 ebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika lakhonjiwe eZambia, lafaka ekhatsi elishanhlitiyo neLichawe lemzabalazo lokunguMnu.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga ri na ku humelela lokukulu eku fikeleleni ka Swikongomelo swa Nhlangano wa Tinxaka (UN) swo pakanisa eka Nhluvukiso lowu Yaka emahlweni eka rihanyo ra vamanana na vana lava ha ku velekiwaka, na ku sivela ku velekiwa ka vana va lovile.

src_text: Duma Nokwe..     Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Tiko ri ta tlhela ri vuyeriwa swinene tanihileswi varhumiwa va nhlengeletano va nga ta avelana, exikarhi ka swin’wana, maqhinga ya vona lama tirhaka na vutumbuluxi eka timhaka ta rihanyo ra vamanana na vana lava ha ku velekiwaka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kuphunyeleliswa kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe yeKufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Phurojeke ya Ndlela ya Ndzhaka ya ku Lwisana na ya Ntshunxeko (RLHR).

src_text: Lenchubomgomo iphindze futsi iphumelelise Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwentiwa Kwetinsita Tetemafa kutsi tibe teDijithali lokwasungulwa Litiko Letebuciko Netemasiko nga-.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi amukerile xiviko xa nhluvuko lexi nga na vuxokoxoko bya ku tirhisiwa ka phurojeke ya RLHR.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo igcila ekufakeni tinsita tetemafa kutedijithali ngekwenhloso yekutilondvolota, kufinyeleleka kanye nekulawulwa kwebuniyo.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tlhele yi pasisa leswaku Vaholobye va Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano na wa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhosto va va xiphemu xa Komiti ya le Xikarhi ka Vaholobye (IMC) eka RLHR.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kukwenta kube kwedijithali kuyinchubo yekugucula lokucuketfwe kwe-analogi kube ngulokucuketfwe kwedijithali, lokufaka ekhatsi emarekhodi eliphepha, i-microfiche kanye nekucoshwa kwematheyiphu langasiwe ekwedijithali, lenchubomgomo ikhulise lenchazelo emitfonjeni yetedijithali njengelwati lolukhicitwe ngekwedijithali, lolungeke luguculwe lube simo salokuphatsekako.
tgt_text: RLHR phurojeke ya ku tsundzuka ya rixaka leyi kongomisiweke eka ku tsundzuka na ku tlangela rendzo ra Afrika-Dzonga ro ya eka ntshunxeko.
Khabinete yi simekile IMC ku langutela phurojeke leyi na ku nyika vurhangeri bya swa tipolitiki.

src_text: Kwentiwa kube kwedijithali kutawuba tinzuzo letinkhulu kulelive njengoba kutawusita kufinyelela kalula emitfonjeni yelwati, ikakhulukati leyo lephetfwe tilululwati, imitapolwati kanye nemisamo.
tgt_text: Phurojeke yi lava ku katsa mixaka yo hambana ya ku tsundzuka ku tinyikela loku valweri va ntshuxeko va ku endleke leswaku Afrika-Dzonga ri va leri ntshunxekeke na xidemokirasi.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itawusetjentiswa kuhulumende wonkhe kanye nasemmangweni wonkhe     Umtsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Yi tlhela yi pfumelela ku akiwa ka timyuziyamu, switsundzuxo, tilayiburari na tiakhayivhi, naswona yi kongomisa eka ku lemuka moya wa vun’we na ntirhisano exikarhi ka MaAfrika.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa Wanga-.
tgt_text: Yi seketeriwile hi UN naswona yi na vuswikoti byo tiyisisa ntirhisano wa vanhu eka vanhu hi ku tirhisa mfuwo na ndzhaka eka tikonkulu hinkwaro.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa wanga-.
tgt_text: Migingiriko yo hlaya leyi nga humelela hi 2022 yi katsa marendzo ya Vaholobye yo ya eBotswana na Zimbabwe xikan’we na ku kunguhata tinhlengeletano na Angola na Tanzania.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kuchibela Imitsetfo leminyenti lesetjentiswa Litiko Letebulungiswa NeMtsetfosisekelo ngekulungisa tindzaba tetebucwepheshe kanye netindzaba letitsintsa kusetjentiswa mbamba kweMitsetfo..     LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucuketse tindzinyana letinge-37 letihlongota tichibelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kungahambi kahle ngekwemtsetfosisekelo kwaleMitsetfo leyehlukahlukene     Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Migingiriko leyi fambisanaka na phurojeke leyi yi kongomisa eka ku hlanganisa matiko hinkwawo ya le Dzongeni wa Afrika na ku dyondzisa vantshwa hi ku lwisana na vukoloni na xihlawuhlawu.

src_text: Lilanga Lemalungelo Eluntfu.
tgt_text: Hi ndlela leyi fanaka,  pholisi yi endla mpfumelelo wa ku vuyisiwa ka masalela ya valweri va ntshuxeko va Afrika-Dzonga lava lahliweke ematikweni mambe.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga emkhosini wavelonkhe weLilanga Letemalungelo Eluntfu langa-2023 ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo  Enshonalanga yeDe Aar, eNyakatfo Kapa..     Ingcikitsisicubulo  itsi: “Kuhlanganisa Nekusimamisa Lisiko Lelilungelo Leluntfu Kuchubekela Embili Kulikusasa”, lapho sikhumbula kubulawa ngesibhuku nangebunyenti kwebantfu baseSharpeville nebakaLanga, kanye naleminye imishuco leyaba khona mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 1960 kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi.
tgt_text: Kwalomu ka 11 wa masirha lawa ya tivekaka ku va ya maAfrika-Dzonga ya kumiwile eZambia, kukatsa na ra Mulwela ntshunxeko wo tiya Tatana Duma Nokwe.

src_text: Singuhulumende, sichubeka nekutinikela etibopheni tetfu temtsetfosisekelo tekuvikela emalungelo eluntfu abo bonkhe bantfu balelive letfu.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Rixaka ya ku endliwa ka Vutshila, Ndhavuko na Ndzhaka swi va swa Dijitali.

src_text: Asisebente sonkhe ngekubambisana kutsi kungabikhona lesimshiya emuva ekwenteni imigomo yeMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 kanye neMculu Wemalungelo ube yintfo lephilwa mbamba yawonkhewonkhe..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lemanti.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku tirhisiwa ka Pholisi ya Rixaka ya ku endliwa ka Vutshila, Ndhavuko na Ndzhaka swi va swa Dijitali.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lemanti kusukela mhla tinge-20 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Kusheshisa Ingucuko”..     Leliviki lihlangana neLilanga Lemhlaba Letemanti mhla tinge-22 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, legcamisa kubaluleka kwemanti lahlantekile.
tgt_text: Pholisi yi nyika matimba yo ya emahlweni ka Pholisi ya Rixaka ya ku endliwa ka Switirhisiwa swa Ndzhaka swi va swa Dijitali leyi nga tumbuluxiwa hi Ndzawulo ya Vutshila na Mfuwo ya nkarhi wolowo hi.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kube netimvula letinkhulu etindzaweni letinyenti talelive, iNingizimu Afrika iyachubeka nekuba live leleswela emanti futsi isezingeni le-30 lemave lome kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.
tgt_text: Pholisi yi kongomisa eka ku endliwa ka switirhisiwa swa ndzhaka swi va dijitali hi xikongomelo xo hlayisa, ku fikelela na vufambisi bya vun’wini.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icele tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tivikele imitfombo yetfu yemanti leligugu kakhulu njengetihlambo, njengoba tibaluleke kakhulu ngoba tingumtfombo wesikhatsi lesidze.
tgt_text: Hambi leswi ku endla swilo swi va swa dijitali ku nga endlelo ro hundzula swilo swa analogu ku va swilo swa dijitali, ku katsa na tirhekhodo ta maphepha, miyikhurofichi na tirhekhodo ta thepi leti nga riki ta dijitali, pholisi yi ndlandlamuxe nhlamuselo leyi eka switirhisiwa leswi nga endliwa swi ri swa dijitali swo fana na mahungu lama humesiweke hi ndlela ya dijitali, lawa ya nga ta ka ya nga hundzuriwi eka xivumbeko xa xiviri .

src_text: Sonkhe sinendzima lesifanele kutsi siyidlale songe emanti kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi imitfombo yetfu ayipheli..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lesifo Semaphaphu  (i-TB).
tgt_text: Ku tirhisiwa ka dijitali ku ta va na mivuyelo leyikulu eka tiko tanihileswi swi nga ta tisa ku fikeleriwa ka switirhisiwa swa mahungu hi ku olova, ngopfungopfu leswi nga eka tiakhayivhi, tilayiburari na timyuziyamu.

src_text: Sekelamengameli Paul Mashatile utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga ngelilanga lekukhunjulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kweLilanga Lemhlaba Le-TB mhla tinge-24 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Yebo!
tgt_text: Pholisi yi ta tirhisiwa hinkwako eka mfumo na le ka vaaki  Nawumbisi.

src_text: Wena ukanye Nami Singayicedza i-TB”..     Lomkhosi losemtsetfweni lotawubanjelwa eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo i-Thlabane eNyakatfonshonalanga utawuphindze futsi ube sikhatsi sekutsi Umkhandlu Wavelonkhe WaseNingizimu Afrika Wete-AIDS kanye neLitiko Letemphilo wetfule Luhlelobuciko Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta lwanga-2023 kuya ku-2028 lwe-TB, i-HIV kanye neTifo Letitsatselwana Ecansini.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Timhaka ta Vuavanyisi wa.

src_text: Loku kwakhela kunchubekelembili lenkhulu letfolwe ngekugcila kabusha ekuvikeleni, ekwelapheni, ekutsatseni, ekufinyeleleni kanye nasekutfobeleni, kanye nekucedza lubandlululo nekukhishwa inyubatana  Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku yisiwa ka Nawumbisi wo Cinca Timhaka ta Vuavanyisi wa 2023 ePalamende.

src_text: KuhalaliselaIkhabhinethi yendlulisela kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle: Ecenjini lema-Protea kwanyalo langenise ema-West Indies mayelana neluvakasho lolumkhakhaminyenti.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wu kongomisa eka ku cinca Milawu yo tala leyi lawuriwaka hi Ndzawulo ya Vululami na Nhluvukiso wa Vumbiwa hi ku lulamisa timhaka ta xithekiniki na timhaka leti khumbaka ku tirhisiwa ka xiviri ka Milawu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi besekele licembu lema-Protea ngesikhatsi lichubeka liphakamisa umjeka wetfu.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wu na swivulwana swa 37 leswi ringanyetaka ku cinca ku lulamisa swihoxo swa vumbiwa swa Milawu yo hambana  Mitirho leyi Taka.

src_text: Emavi endvudvuto Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani: I-MEC yeTemfundvo yaseFree State Tate Makgoe (60), lowafaka ligalelo lelikhulu kakhulu emkhakheni wetemfundvo futsi wahola ngemphumelelo iFree State kutsi itfole lizinga lekuphumelela kamatekuletjeni lelisetulu kakhulu iminyaka lemine lelandzelanako.Mk.
tgt_text: Siku ra Timfanelo ta Ximunhu.

src_text: Maurencia Gillion, lobekamelele Inshonalanga Kapa kuMKhandlu Wavelonkhe Wetifundza, futsi lobekasebenta kuLikomidi Lavelonkhe Letifundza leTemphilo Netenhlalakahle.
tgt_text: Presidente Ramaphosa ta nyika mbulavulo wa nkoka eka ntirho wa rixaka wa Siku ra Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ra 2023 hi Ravumbirhi, 21 Nyenyankulu 2023 eXitediyamu xa De Aar West, eKapa N'walungu.

src_text: Bekasishikashiki lesatiwa kakhulu futsi ubasebentele kakhulu bantfu baseNshonalanga Kapa, ikakhulu betindzawo tasemaphandleni, iminyaka leminyenti.UMnu.
tgt_text: Nkongomelo wa lembe leri i: “Ku Hlanganisa na ku Hlayisa Mfuwo wa Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ku ya eka Vumundzuku”, loko hi ri karhi hi tsundzuka ku dlayeteriwa ka vanhu eSharpeville na le Langa, na timachi tin’wana leti nga humelela hi ti 21 Nyenyankulu 1960 etikweni hinkwaro.

src_text: John Wills (66), lobekasishikashiki futsi angummeli wetemalungelo ebantfu lobekatiwa kakhulu lowamelela baholi betembusave labanyenti, kufaka ekhatsi Mengameli wesikhatsi lesendlulile Nelson Mandela.UMnu.
tgt_text: Tanihi mfumo, ha ha tinyiketerile eka vutihlamuleri bya vumbiwa byo sirhelela timfanelo ta ximunhu ta vanhu hinkwavo etikweni hi tirhisaneni ku tiyisisa leswaku hi siyi munhu endzhaku eku endleni ka swiletelo swa Vumbiwa ra Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga ra 1996 na Nawumbisi wa Timfanelo swi va ntiyiso lowu hanyaka eka hinkwavo.

src_text: Mark Pilgrim (54), lobekawetindzaba lowafaka inshisekelo waphindze futsi wakhutsata bantfu labanyenti embonini yetindzaba.
tgt_text: Siku ra Mati ra Misava Hinkwayo.

src_text: Mk.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga ri ta fungha Vhiki ra Mati ra Rixaka ku sukela hi ti 20 ku fikela hi ti 26 Nyenyankulu 2023 ehansi ka nkongomelo lowu nge: “Ku hatlisisa ku Cinca”.

src_text: Gloria Bosman (50), umhlabeleli nemcambi wetingoma te-jazz eNingizimu Afrika lowatfola tindondo letinyenti     Kubekwa EtikhundleniKutawucinisekiswa ticu tetemfundvo nekuhlola kufaneleka kwabo bonkhe lababekwe etikhundleni.
tgt_text: Vhiki leri ri fambisana na Siku ra Mati ra Misava Hinkwayo hi ti 22 Nyenyankulu 2023, leri kombisaka nkoka wa mati yo tenga.

src_text: Emalunga Emkhandlu Wetekweluleka Baphatsi Betikimu Tematayitela Etincenye     Adv.
tgt_text: Hambi leswi ku nga na timpfula ta matimba sweswinyana eka swiphemu swa tiko, Afrika-Dzonga ra ha ri tiko leri kayivelaka mati naswona ri le ka xiyimo xa vu 30 eka matiko yo oma swinene emisaveni.

src_text: Boyce Mkhize (Sihlalo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Sekelasihlalo)     Mk.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi komberile vaakatiko hinkwavo ku sirhelela switirhisiwa swa hina swa risima swa mati swo fana na tindhawu ta mati, tanihileswi leswi swi nga swa nkoka eka nsirhelelo wa hina wa mati wa nkarhi wo leha.

src_text: Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     UMnu.
tgt_text: Hinkwerhu hi na xiave lexi hi faneleke ku xi endla eku hlayiseni mati na ku tiyisisa leswaku mphakelo wa hina wu omi.

src_text: Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Adv.
tgt_text: Siku ra Vuvabyi bya Rifuva ra Misava Hinkwayo (TB).

src_text: Nomonde Nokuthula January     UMnu.
tgt_text: Xandla xa Presidente Paul Mashatile ta nyika mbulavulo wa nkoka hi nkarhi wa ximfumo wo tsundzuka Siku ra TB ra Misava hi ti 24 Nyenyankulu 2023 ehansi ka nkongomelo lowu nge: “Ina!

src_text: Iqbal Mohamed Motala; kanye     naDkt.
tgt_text: Mina Na Wena Hi Nga Herisa TB”.

src_text: Vuyisani Moss..     Emalunga Ekhomishini Yamantji     Mk.
tgt_text: Ntirho wa ximfumo eXitediyamu xa Thlabane eN’walungu-Vupeladyambu wu ta tlhela wu vona Huvo ya AIDS ya Rixaka ya Afrika-Dzonga na Ndzawulo ya Rihanyo va simeka Kungu ra Qhinga ra TB, HIV na Mavabyi ya swa Masangu ra Rixaka ra 2023 ku ya eka.

src_text: Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    UMnu.
tgt_text: Leswi swi aka eka ku humelela lokukulu loku fikeleleriweke hi ku tirhisa ku kongomisiwa hi vuntshwa eka ku sivela, vutshunguri, ku amukeriwa, ku vikiwa na ku landzelela, na ku herisa xihlawuhlawu na ku soriwa  Mahungu.

src_text: Hanif Vally;(iii)    Dkt.
tgt_text: VuhoyozeriKhabinete yi hundzisele ku hoyozela na ku navelela leswinene eka:Va Proteas lava sweswi va rhurhela West Indies eka rendzo ra swivumbeko swo tala.

src_text: Cornelia September;(iv)    UMnu.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi kombela maAfrika-Dzonga hinkwavo ku seketela va Proteas loko va ri karhi va ya emahlweni va hahisela mujeko wa hina ehenhla.

src_text: Andre Harrison (uyaphindza kukhetfwa); na     Solw.
tgt_text: MichaveleloKhabinete yi hundzisele ku chavelela eka ndyangu na vanghana va:MEC wa Dyondzo ya Free State Tate Makgoe (60), loyi hoxeke xandla swinene eka sekithara ya dyondzo naswona humelerile eku rhangeleni Free State ku va yi fikelela mpimo wa le henhla wa mapaselo ya ka matiriki eka malembe ya mune hi ku landzelelana.Manana Maurencia Gillion, loyi yimeleke KapaVupeladyambu eka Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu, na ku tirha eka Komiti yo Hoxa Tihlo ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Rihanyo na Vukorhokeri bya Vaaki ari mugingiriki loyi tivekaka swinene naswona tirhele vanhu va Kapavupeladyambu, ngopfungopfu eka tindhawu ta le makaya ta xifundzhankulu, kuringana malembe yotala.Tatana John Wills (66), gqweta ra ndhuma ra timfanelo ta ximunhu na mugingiriki loyi yimeleke varhangeri vo hlaya va swa tipolitiki, ku katsa na khale ka Presidente Nelson Mandela.Tatana Mark Pilgrim (54), mutirhi wa vuhangalasi bya mahungu loyi hlohloteleke no khutaza vanhu vo tala eka indhasitiri ya vuhangalasi bya mahungu.Manana Gloria Bosman (50), muyimbeleri na muqambhi wa jazz wa Afrika-Dzonga loyi nga wina masagwadi yo tala  Ku ThoriwaKu thoriwa hinkwako ku ta ya hi ku tiyisisiwa ka vuthwaseri na ku kamberiwa ka mpfumelelo wa vuhlayiseki lowu faneleke.

src_text: Estelle Hurter (uyaphindza kukhetfwa).
tgt_text: Swirho swa Huvo ya Vutsundzuxi bya Vulawuri bya Swikimi swa Vun’wini bya Xiyenge xa Ndhawu  Adv Boyce Mkhize (Mutshamaxitulu)  Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Xandla xa Mutshamaxitulu)   Manana Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana  Tatana Pieter Jacobus De Beer  Adv Nomonde Nokuthula January  Tatana Iqbal Mohamed Motala; na  Dokodela Vuyisani Moss.
